channel.title: Parse on Simple Solution

item.title: Parse String into Integer value in Java
item.description: In this Java core tutorial, we learn how to convert a String value into int value in Java application. Using Integer.parseInt() static method Following Java example using Integer.parseInt() static method to convert a String value into int value. ParseStringToIntExample1.java public class ParseStringToIntExample1 { public static void main(String[] args) { int result1 = Integer.parseInt("1234"); int result2 = Integer.parseInt("+5"); int result3 = Integer.parseInt("-5"); System.out.println(result1); System.out.println(result2); System.out.println(result3); } } The output is: 1234 5 -5
